summary: It attempts to fix the contrast in the game that makes everything in the shade black a-la Doom 3.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Contrast Fix 0.1
by pizdel

- It attempts to fix the contrast in the game that makes everything in the shade black a-la Doom 3.
- To activate the fix :
add the .esp to your Data directory,
select it in the Launcher under Data Files
then when ingame type in the console \\\"imod fix\\\" without the quotes
save your game. It will persist.

- Also added just a tiny little more saturation.
- When I grow up I\\\'ll make a proper mod out of it :)

You can also get the mod from the Steam Workshop :
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=121158276&searchtext=
author: pizdel
